text: Cicely (Myrrhis odorata), also called sweet cicely, is a plant in the family Apiaceae. It is a tall perennial plant, growing to 2 meters tall. The leaves are divided. The flowers are white. The seeds are slender. == Uses == Cicely leaves are sometimes used as a herb, with a strong taste of anise. Category:Apiaceae Category:Herbs
title: Cicely
